install.name: Simple Video Flash Player Module
install.author: www.time2online.de
install.description:
# Simple Video Flash Player Module #

For download, demo and documentation use http://www.time2online.de.

# JW Player License #

Below you see a simple embedded example of the JW Player!

Licensing: The player is licensed under a http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/ Creative Commons License. It allows you to use, modify and redistribute the script, but only for noncommercial purposes.

For corporate use, http://www.longtailvideo.com/players/order Order commercial licenses please apply for a commercial license.

param.name: height
param.label: Video Height
param.description: the height of the flash player (default value is 225)

param.name: width
param.label: Video Width
param.description: the width of the flash player (default value is 225)

param.name: controlbar
param.label: Controlbar
param.description: position of the controlbar (default value is bottom)

param.name: backcolor
param.label: Background Color
param.description: the background-color of the flash player (for example #e2e2e2)

param.name: frontcolor
param.label: Front Color
param.description: the icon/text color of the player (for example #000000)

param.name: lightcolor
param.label: Light Color
param.description: the rollover color of the player (for example #b2b2b2)

param.name: screencolor
param.label: Screen Color
param.description: The display color of the player (for example #000000)

param.name: file
param.label: Single Video URL
param.description: edit flash video url (for example http://content.bitsontherun.com/videos/3ta6fhJQ.flv)

param.name: image
param.label: Preview Image URL
param.description: edit preview image url (for example http://content.bitsontherun.com/thumbs/qyehIiBT.jpg)

param.name: fallbackimage
param.label: Fallback Image URL
param.description: edit fallback image url (for example http://content.bitsontherun.com/thumbs/qyehIiBT.jpg)

param.name: linktarget
param.label: Link URL
param.description: edit link to an external site (for example http://www.joomla.org)

param.name: playlistfile
param.label: Multi Playlist URL
param.description: edit XML playlist file location (for example http://www.longtailvideo.com/jw/upload/mrss.xml)

param.name: playlist
param.label: Playlist Position
param.description: position of the playlist (default value is over)

param.name: playlistsize
param.label: Playlistsize
param.description: edit height or width of the playlist (default is 180)

param.name: autostart
param.label: Autostart
param.description: automatically start playing (default value is no)

param.name: repeat
param.label: Repeat
param.description: continously repeat playback (default value is no)

param.name: shuffle
param.label: Shuffle
param.description: shuffle playlist order (default value is no)

param.name: stretching
param.label: Stretching
param.description: resize mode of display content (default value is uniform)

param.name: skin
param.label: Skin URL
param.description: edit link to an skin file (for example http://www.longtailvideo.com/jw/upload/stylish.swf)

param.name: plugins
param.label: Plugin ID
param.description: edit ids of plugin to load (for example revolt)

param.name: streamer
param.label: Streamer
param.description: edit location of server/script to use for streaming (for example rtmp://edge01.fms.dutchview.nl/botr/)
